description.value: A bipod is a device mounted to a two-handed blaster that lacks the fixed property to offer increased stability while prone. As an action, you can deploy or collapse the bipod. While deployed, you ignore the Strength requirement on the attached blaster with the strength property while you are prone, and your speed is reduced to 0. Additionally, while deployed and prone, you have a +10 bonus to ability checks and saving throws to avoid being disarmed of the weapon.
